metadata.title: CVE-2020-9794 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issue is fixed in iOS 13.5 and iPadOS 13.5, macOS Catalina 10.15.5, tvOS 13.4.5, watchOS 6.2.5, iTunes 12.10.7 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.2, iCloud for Windows 7.19. A malicious application may cause a denial of service or potentially disclose memory contents.

notes.note: mdeslaur> This may be an Apple-specific CVE, as of 2021-02-08, no details are available as to what the upstream fix is.

criterions.comment: sqlite package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
sqlite3 package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
